item.title: Writing stuff down
item.description: I always wanted to start blogging about stuff that I find interesting but oh boy you wonâ€™t know how scrambled your thoughts are until you start to articulate them to write them down. anyways. I think writing down what occupies my mind is a great way to stay sane, a form of therapy of some sort, although coming to what role psychology can play in your life I believe little to none.
